TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content:
I sense the bronies are preparing a lynch mob. We must fight them off.

"Miencraft suz becuz bad gwaffix." -read in the voice of a whiny 10 yo cod-kid.

I enjoy minecraft, nothing wrong with it. Adding normal mapping to the blocks goes a long way visually.
Battlefield is better then COD and vice versea.
Nintendo should buy capcom. god knows capcom isnt doing anything with their properties, and who wouldnt want to see Marvel vs Capcom vs Smash Bros?
I honestly enjoy Nickelback.
Apple products are over priced pieces of crap.
Alienware offers excellent value for gaming PCs.

I honestly enjoy Nickelback.
Apple products are over priced pieces of crap.

I honestly agree with these.

DC Comics is clearly better than Marvel (and optionally vice versa).
Comics? They're for kids!
Justin Bieber sucks.
Just about everything believed by the majority is an outright lie
people only liked the dark knight because heath ledger died. I honestly think his performance was average, as is the whole movie.
Togas were common dress in the Athenian Democracy, and Ancient Greece generally.
hello i m fiend friend lies full of chicks'n not foes ; ) be leave it or not ?
Guardians of the Galaxy is a stupidly childish movie made of shippers and super nerds.

KSP is Elite: Dangerous for idiots.

X-Men The Last Stand is the only good X-Man movie.
Santa Claus doesn't exist.
Magic: the Gathering sucks.
Consoles suck.
pokemon sucks
Jar-Jar Binx, the main character of Battlestar Galactica, is actually a Klingon who went to our universe with a Goauld stargate.
Apparently this one works for a large fraction: Next version of KSP is 1.0.
Game Of Thrones is SO over-rated.
Godzilla is just a guy in a suit.
use your BANKAI GOHAN!!!!

This one applies to us: Heh, the moon landings were a hoax anyways.*

*Disclaimer: I do not believe nor support the belief of the moon landings being faked.

- - - Updated - - -

Jar-Jar Binx, the main character of Battlestar Galactica, is actually a Klingon who went to our universe with a Goauld stargate.

Hold on, this one annoys about 4 or 5 whole fan bases.

Also:

Anime is so gay, just look at that chinese Pokemon!
